recipesJson.name: Strawberry Jello Custard
recipesJson.author: TheDrStore
recipesJson.description:
I know, another strawberry and cream, but what can I say, they are always great. So this isn't a very strawberry forward mix. I wanted a strong emphasise on the thick custard with a bit of strawberry to keep it interesting.

FA Custard = FA Custard Premium

The Custard:
I wanted more if a dairy custard and TFA Vanilla Swirl was perfect to bring in a milk like quality into the mix with the vanilla notes that I needed. FA Custard Premium is perfect for the buttery quality of custard and INW Custard adds the richness and egginess that I needed. 

The Strawberry Jello: 
FA Juicy Strawberry adds this sugary element to the mix and TFA Strawberry helps bring the strawberry a bit more forward. Swedish fish is used low to help create a jello sensation and doesn't add too much to the taste of Swedish fish. 

Super sweet is optional. What can I say, it tastes commercial now.
